text: awlyk almtsfwn bhdhh alsfat astbdlu aldalalat balhda waeadhab allah bmghfrth, fama 'ashadu jra'thm ealaa alnaar bemlhm 'aemal 'ahl alnar!! yuejib allah min 'iiqdamihim ealaa dhlk, faejbu -ayha alnas- min jra'thm, wamin sbrhm ealaa alnaar wmkthhm fyha. whdha ealaa wajh alasthant bhm, walastkhfaf bamrhm
